name: Idle Shooter (I-ALONE-I)
description:
Idle shooting game. Upgrade your ships and destroy all enemies before they reach your base. Get bonus coins every time you pass a level.

Controls

Click to upgrade the skills of your ships and click the ships enemies to destroy.

//
